Armwrestling origin: Armwrestling or armwrestling goes all the way back to the Olympic Games in Athens. Recently, we have seen changes in rules, style and scope
Armwrestling story: Handball is a social and interesting sport, and a match usually lasts between 1 - 2 seconds. Much depends on the athlete's technique, muscle strength and speed. In 1998, the Norwegian Handball Association was incorporated as part of the Norwegian Wrestling Association.
